mapper.sql: addr_id, addr_name, addr_level, addr_type, addr_use, is_blank, addr_parent, addr_private_name, addr_full_name, addr_code, county_id, create_time, create_optr_id, create_done_code, status, str1, str2, str3, str4, str5
mapper.select: select addr_id, addr_name, addr_level, addr_parent, addr_private_name, addr_full_name, county_id, status, str1 from ad_tree where county_id = #{countyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and addr_id <> #{addrId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and addr_private_name like '${addrPrivateName}%'
mapper.insert: insert into ad_tree (addr_id, addr_name, addr_level, addr_type, addr_use, is_blank, addr_parent, addr_private_name, addr_full_name, addr_code, county_id, create_time, create_optr_id, create_done_code, status, str1, str2, str3, str4, str5) values (#{addrId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{addrName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addrLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{addrType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addrUse,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isBlank,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{addrParent,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{addrPrivateName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addrFullName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addrCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{countyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createOptrId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDoneCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{str1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{str2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{str3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{str4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{str5,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update ad_tree
addr_name = #{addrName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
addr_level = #{addrLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER},
addr_type = #{addrType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
addr_use = #{addrUse,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_blank = #{isBlank,jdbcType=CHAR},
addr_parent = #{addrParent,jdbcType=INTEGER},
addr_private_name = #{addrPrivateName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
addr_full_name = #{addrFullName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
addr_code = #{addrCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
county_id = #{countyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_optr_id = #{createOptrId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_done_code = #{createDoneCode,jdbcType=INTEGER},
status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
str1 = #{str1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
str2 = #{str2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
str3 = #{str3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
str4 = #{str4,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
str5 = #{str5,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where addr_id = #{addrId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update ad_tree set addr_name = #{addrName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, addr_level = #{addrLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, addr_type = #{addrType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, addr_use = #{addrUse,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_blank = #{isBlank,jdbcType=CHAR}, addr_parent = #{addrParent,jdbcType=INTEGER}, addr_private_name = #{addrPrivateName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, addr_full_name = #{addrFullName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, addr_code = #{addrCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, county_id = #{countyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_optr_id = #{createOptrId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_done_code = #{createDoneCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, str1 = #{str1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, str2 = #{str2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, str3 = #{str3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, str4 = #{str4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, str5 = #{str5,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where addr_id = #{addrId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
update ad_tree set addr_full_name = replace(addr_full_name,'${str1}', '${addrName}'), addr_private_name = #{addrPrivateName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, where addr_private_name like '${addrPrivateName}%'

update ad_tree set addr_full_name = replace(addr_full_name,'${oldFullName}', '${newAddrFullName}'), addr_private_name = replace(addr_private_name,'${oldAddrPrivateName}', '${newAddrPrivateName}'), str1 = replace(str1,'${oldStr1}', '${newStr1}') where addr_private_name like '${oldAddrPrivateName}%'
